summary: Consume the Emelia API to perform operations on campaigns and contact lists.

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: Select the type of resource to perform operations on, either Campaign or Contact List.

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Select the operation to perform on the chosen resource, such as Add Contact, Create, Duplicate, Get, etc.

parameters.name: campaignId
parameters.description: The ID of the campaign to add the contact to. Choose from the list or specify an ID using an expression.

parameters.name: contactEmail
parameters.description: The email of the contact to add to the campaign.

parameters.name: additionalFields
parameters.description: Additional fields to include when adding a contact to a campaign, such as custom fields, first name, last contacted date, last name, last opened date, last replied date, etc.
